title: Did Donald Trump take $150,000 from the Small Business Fund on 9/11?
subtitle: In 2016, an article in New York Daily News on the receipt by Donald Trump of $150,000 in federal aid after 9/11 was reviewed inaccurately.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: Donald Trump was improperly paid $150,000 in federal assistance to small businesses affected by the 11/9 attacks, although his work was not small or damaged in the attacks.
